NOSTRAGAMUS BETA USER NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT
 
Your access to and use of the Android app Nostagramus (here-after referred to as Software), owned by Gambit Sports Private Limited (here-after referred to as Company), for the purposes of Beta testing, is contingent on your acceptance of and compliance with the Terms described in this document. These Terms apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Software. By accessing or using the Software you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Software. 

 User's Obligations 
 
 User shall play and test the Software under normally expected operating conditions in User's environment during the test period. User can share the game among his/her/their peers/staff for further testing after receiving prior consent from the Company or its authorised representatives. All the terms of the agreement given below are expected to be upheld by the user and peers/staff with whom the game has been shared. The user is obligated to ensure the others also follow the terms of this agreement. In case of any violation of the terms of this agreement by the user or any (or a group) of the peers, the user will be held in contempt of the non-disclosure agreement. The management of the Company has then the right to receive compensation as appropriately decided by itself or even initiate necessary litigations, under jurisdictions as described in General Provisions. 

 Software a Trade Secret 

 The Software is proprietary to, and a valuable trade secret of the Company. It is entrusted to User only for the purposes of demonstration and feedback of usability. User shall maintain Software in the strictest confidence. User will not, without Company's prior written consent: (a) disclose any information about Software, its idea, concept, implementation, design, gameplay, feature, and performance specifications, its code, and the existence of the beta test and its results to anyone other than those who are performing the testing and who shall be subject to nondisclosure restrictions at least as protective as those set forth in this Agreement; (b) copy any portion of Software or documentation, except to the extent necessary to perform beta testing; or reverse engineer, decompile or disassemble Software or any portion of it. 
 
 Security Precautions 

 User shall take reasonable security precautions to prevent the “Software” from being accessed by unauthorized individuals whether stored on User's hard drive or e-mail/cloud servers or on mobile devices, tablets, desktop computers or on physical copies such as CD-ROMS, diskettes or other media. 
 
 Term of Agreement 

 The test period shall last till 31st December. This Agreement shall terminate at the end of the test period and after the user deletes the “Software” from his records. The restrictions and obligations contained in Clauses 1,2,3,5,6 and 7 shall survive the expiration, termination or cancellation of this Agreement, and shall continue to bind User, its successors, heirs and assigns. Limitation of Liability Company shall not be responsible for any loss or damage to User or any third parties caused by Software. COMPANY SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGE, WHETHER BASED ON CONTRACT OR TORT OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY, ARISING OUT OF ANY USE OF SOFTWARE OR ANY PERFORMANCE OF THIS AGREEMENT. 

 No Rights Granted 

 This Agreement does not constitute a grant or an intention or commitment to grant any right, title or interest in Software or Company's trade secrets to User. User may not sell or transfer any portion of Software to any third party or use Software in any manner to produce, market or support its own products. User shall not identify Software as coming from any source other than Company. 

 General Provisions 

 
(a) Severability: If a court finds any provision of this Agreement invalid or unenforceable, the remainder of this Agreement shall be interpreted so as best to effect the intent of the parties. 
(b) Integration: This Agreement expresses the complete understanding of the parties with respect to the subject matter and supersedes all prior proposals, agreements, representations and understandings. This Agreement may not be amended except in a writing signed by both parties. 
(c) Waiver: The failure to exercise any right provided in this Agreement shall not be a waiver of prior or subsequent rights. 
(d) Attorney Fees and Expenses: In a dispute arising out of or related to this Agreement, the prevailing party shall have the right to collect from the other party its reasonable attorney fees and costs and necessary expenditures. 
(e) Jurisdiction: This Agreement shall be governed in accordance with the laws of the State of Karnataka. The parties consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the federal and state courts located in Karnataka, India in any action arising out of or relating to this Agreement. The parties waive any other venue to which either party might be entitled by domicile or otherwise.

%1$s just predicted %2$s events in %3$s match and scored %4$d points.

Get the Nostragamus app and see if you can do better than me in the next match.
%5$s

Let\'s go through a sample game to help you understand how to ace it at Nostragamus. You may skip if you are familiar with the gameplay, and you can always access this sample game from the Settings menu inside your Profile section.
You just finished your first game, but its now time for the real deal. Proceed to your tournament feed to start swiping on upcoming sporting matches!
Swipe to make a choice between the two options presented
Swipe up to go for the third option
Sometimes questions will have a third option like Neither, Both or Draw. Tap this or swipe upwards to go with this option
Powerups will help you maximise your score so use them wisely. You can use only one powerup per question
You seem to be running low!
You get one of each powerup , everytime a friend joins the game
button on the game screen, to add
Keep track of how you\'re doing compared to friends, family and colleagues!
Start playing a challenge to view leaderboards!
Matches you play will appear here
Compete for fun, or win cash
Read in-game stats. Swipe to predict
You can tap on the icon if you need any help with the powerups!
You have %1$s powerups to use across 5 matches in this challenge, Use them to score higher!
Eg. Avg. 1st innings score at this venue in the IPL is 154 compared to 146 in the 2nd innings. However, RCB haven’t managed to score more than 150 runs in their last 3 matches here.
Eg. How many aggregate runs will be scored?
Kindly provide permission to access your email id
Unfortunately we couldn’t retrieve your email address from Facebook. We need your email address to save all your preferences.
Split points, see\nresults for more info
Press back button again to exit
By clicking here,you confirm that you are above 18 years of age and are not from either Assam or Orissa(as Games of Skills are allowed in these states).
Gain access to contests with prizes upto ₹ 10,000 on the full version of Nostragamus!
